name: pnp-powerplatform-prompts-merge-pdfs-and-send-outlook-email-message
title: Merge PDF files and send merged file as an attachment in an Outlook email message
shortDescription: This Power Automate for desktop Copilot prompt helps with merging PDF files and sending the merged file as an attachment in an Outlook email message.
longDescription: This Power Automate for desktop Copilot prompt helps with merging PDF files and sending the merged file as an attachment in an Outlook email message.

metadata.value: I want to create automation that prompts the user to select PDF files to merge where the chosen files are merged, and then send an email through Outlook to [email address] with the merged PDF files as an attachment

thumbnails.alt: Preview of prompt in Power Automate for desktop Copilot
